feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing implemented frontend files, features, components, and test IDs with high confidence.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of each frontend file including pages, hooks, components, and utilities.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base and theme CSS defining OKLCH color tokens, dark mode variables, and global styles.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry file mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component that restores or sets session state and switches between LandingPage and ChatPage.
frontend/src/components/actions/CopyCode: Button that copies a session code to clipboard with fallback and visual confirmation.
frontend/src/components/chat/AttachmentC: Chat input component supporting text, file/image attachments, previews, size validation, and typing signals.
frontend/src/components/chat/Participant: Displays chat participants with typing indicators, highlighting the current user and supporting a compact view.

frontend/src/components/feedback/InlineE: Shows an inline error message with an alert icon styled using Tailwind.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity, refetching dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, handling identity loading, login, logout, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder file exporting nothing, indicating queries are handled by custom hooks.
frontend/src/hooks/useSessionPolling.ts: Polls session data, sends messages and attachments, and updates video call URLs through the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useTypingSignal.ts: Sends throttled typing indicator updates to the backend and manages typing timeout behavior.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and a custom vibrant color theme with light and dark mode variables.
frontend/src/lib/attachments.ts: Provides file utilities including conversion to Uint8Array, image checks, blob URL creation, and size formatting.
frontend/src/lib/linkify.tsx: Parses text and converts URLs into clickable links with styling.
frontend/src/lib/sessionStorage.ts: Manages session and participant ID persistence using sessionStorage with fallback generation.
frontend/src/lib/time.ts: Formats timestamps from nanoseconds into human-readable date or time strings.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/ChatPage.tsx: Main chat UI handling messaging, attachments, typing signals, video call URL management, and scroll behavior using session polling.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Landing screen for creating or joining sessions with input validation, session storage, and actor-based backend calls.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: TailwindCSS configuration extending colors, fonts, animations, and enabling plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing chat app goals, existing features, known issues, and active fix request context.
